Welcome To Maggio Mares Software
Beautiful, mobile optimized Sites
Tell Me More

Services

We believe all successful businesses need a mobile optimized website. This is why we build our websites to support mobile devices from the ground up. We also provide a host of additional services and tools designed to boost your business' revenue and online presence.

Responsive Design

Your website responds to the screen size of the user, making sure that all your visitors get a great user experience. In addition, we uses the latest technology to make sure your site looks modern and loads fast.

Copyright

We make sure your site adheres to all relevant copyright rules and write clear and concise copyright and privacy policy.

Content Management

Focus on your business while we manage your content and updates.

Social Media

Expand your online presence with social media integration such as Twitter, Facebook, or Yelp. We can manage your accounts and ad campaigns to widen your audience and generate page views.

TreeHut

Features our classic dynamic menu, a filter enabled food gallery, client reviews and contact sections, and a mobile optimized user experience.

  • Category: Single-Page

Eatery

Eatery offers multiple pages to organize your information, each mobile-friendly and responsive. Also featured is a static 3-column menu, an organized "About Us" page, a side scrolling gallery, and a trendy landing page.

  • Category: Multi-Page

Golden

This website is an example of what we can do. It features an interactive navigation bar, expandable portfolio samples, vertical narrative, and an elegant contact form.

  • Category: Single-Page

Red Wine

Inspired by wine businesses, Red Wine features organized information about popular items, news & events, elegant but simple galleries, and a custom blog.

  • Category: Multi-Page

Food House

Food House is a multi-page restaurant site that has an elegant, yet colorful feel to it. It features a slideshow landing pages that is not too intrusive, a simple welcome and about section that displays information in a sophisticated manner, zoom-in effect on fallery images, and a dynamic "Team" section.

  • Category: Multi-Page

Yamekhane

Features a logo-only landing page, column based announcements, image-based menu with hover-over descriptions and interactive categories, and a calendar for special occasions.

  • Category: Single-Page
